intro: Welcome to my homepage! My name is Ruonan. I used to be an auditor and worked in a public accounting firm. Due to some personal reasons, I moved to Seattle area and decide to become a programmer in the near future. I came to Seattle this summer and since the plane landed, this city has become my favorite place in the States. Nowadays, the rain has come, I hope the winter will not be as miserable as I was told. Knowing more about me, please click on the links or reach me out through the email on the bottom.
